title: Sunsetting API Authentication via Query Parameters, and the OAuth Applications API
content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 11, 14:00 UTC  -  Aug 13, 14:00 UTC

Jun 29, 07:14 UTC
Scheduled - We will be removing API Authentication via Query Parameters and OAuth Application API during these hours as part of a planned deprecation cycle. For more information, please read our blog post.

title: GitHub Container Registry in read-only mode
content:
Jun 5, 17:30 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 5, 16:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 2, 14:20 UTC
Scheduled - GitHub will be performing scheduled maintenance on GitHub Container Registry (ghcr.io). During this time GitHub Container Registry will be put in Read Only mode. This means that docker pull commands will continue to work, however docker push commands to the GitHub Container Registry will be denied during this period.
contentSnippet:
Jun  5, 17:30 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
Jun  5, 16:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Jun  2, 14:20 UTC
Scheduled - GitHub will be performing scheduled maintenance on GitHub Container Registry (ghcr.io). During this time GitHub Container Registry will be put in Read Only mode. This means that docker pull commands will continue to work, however docker push commands to the GitHub Container Registry will be denied during this period.

title: Incident with GitHub Actions
content:
May 26, 18:56 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 26, 16:57 UTC
Update - GitHub Actions continues to observe < 2% of customer runs being impacted. The team is continuing to work on the mitigation.

May 26, 15:25 UTC
Update - GitHub Actions are observing < 2% of customer runs experiencing delayed start times and < 2% of runs encountering intermittent failures. We have identified the source and are actively mitigating

May 26, 15:08 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for GitHub Actions.

title: Incident with GitHub Actions
content:
May 20, 18:54 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 20, 17:36 UTC
Update - Less than 6% of users continue to see delays in jobs starting. Jobs that haven't started for over 45 minutes will fail. Engineers are continuing to work on mitigation.

May 20, 16:16 UTC
Update - Observing around 4% of customer jobs experiencing delayed start times. We have identified the source and are currently active in mitigating.

May 20, 16:02 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for GitHub Actions.
contentSnippet:

title: Incident with GitHub Actions
content:
May 18, 19:09 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 18, 16:08 UTC
Update - We continue to observe our services recover with an increasing number of successful builds, we will keep monitoring until full recovery and will provide more updates soon.

May 18, 13:58 UTC
Update - We have rolled out a fix and are observing that action runs are slowly improving. We are monitoring recovery and will provide more updates soon.

May 18, 13:12 UTC
Update - We have begun rolling out a mitigation attempt and will provide an update once we know more.

May 18, 11:06 UTC
Update - We have confirmed that run starts are delayed for a number of customers. We have identified the issue and are working on a fix.

May 18, 08:45 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for GitHub Actions.
